mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, r.* from( select rec.*, img.cook_db,img.cook_num,img.cook_original, row_number() over (PARTITION BY rec.recipe_num ORDER BY rec.recipe_num) as n from recipe rec, cook_image img where rec.recipe_num = img.recipe_num ) r where r.n = 1 ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 10 order by recipe_best desc

select * from ( select rownum rnum, r.* from( select rec.*, img.cook_db,img.cook_num,img.cook_original, row_number() over (PARTITION BY rec.recipe_num ORDER BY rec.recipe_num) as n from recipe rec, cook_image img where rec.recipe_num = img.recipe_num ) r where r.n = 1 ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 10 order by recipe_date desc
